Welcome to Determined!

What is Determined AI?

Determined is an open source deep learning training platform that makes building models fast and easy.

Why Determined AI?

With Determined you can integrate these features into an easy-to-use, high-performance deep learning environment:

  • Train models faster using state-of-the-art multi-gpu-training, without changing your model code.
  • Automatically find high-quality models using advanced hyperparameter-tuning from the creators of Hyperband.
  • Get more from your GPUs with smart scheduling, reducing cloud GPU costs by seamlessly using preemptible instances.
  • Leverage experiment tracking out-of-the-box to track and reproduce your work, tracking code versions, metrics, checkpoints, and hyperparameters.

Spend your time building models instead of managing infrastructure.

At the same time, continue using popular Deep Learning libraries, such as TensorFlow Keras, TensorFlow Estimator, and PyTorch, and simply call the Determined API from your existing model code.
